product_name: Wilderness Systems Tarpon 120 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak
long_description: Decked out with a rod holder and lots of room for your fishing gear, the Wilderness Systems Tarpon 120 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak offers easy-to-paddle stability to chase the big one. Smooth-paddling design lends itself to serious paddling fun; kayak tracks very well, offers surprising speed and turns easily. 12 ft. 3 in. length and moderate weight allow kayak to be transported by the solo paddler while still providing great stability. Hull is crafted in high-density polyethylene to provide rugged durability and easy care. Seat and back pads use soft, contoured foam covered in a textured stretch material for plush comfort and protection from the cold. Scalloped, contoured seat pan cradles and cushions legs, and backrest conforms to size of paddler and flexes a bit with every paddle stroke. Leg lifter uses handle to shore up space below your legs; back strap lowers seat back, and the angle of back rest is adjustable as well. Small gear bag under seat features a gear clip and enough capacity for a water bottle or extra food. Dual Slide-Trax rail system at front of seating area and tank well can attach compatible accessories (not included) without tools or complicated adjustments. Adjustable Keepers footbraces; center and bow hatch with locking levers; 64 lb. weight.
short_description: Decked out with a rod holder and lots of room for your fishing gear, the Wilderness Systems Tarpon 120 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak offers easy-to-paddle stability to chase the big one.
